00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 // Function: ColumnDeleteCommand()
00028 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 ColumnDeleteCommand::ColumnDeleteCommand(DiagramColumnLayout* layout, DiagramColumn* column,
00030                                          QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent),
00031                                                                  layout_(layout), column_(column), del_(true)
00032 {
00033     // Create child commands for removing interconnections.
00034     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, column->childItems())
00035     {
00036         if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00037         {
00038             DiagramComponent* comp = static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item);
00039 
00040             foreach (QGraphicsItem* childItem, comp->childItems())
00041             {
00042                 if (childItem->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00043                 {
00044                     continue;
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(childItem);
00048 
00049                 foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, diagramPort->getInterconnections())
00050                 {
00051                     QUndoCommand* cmd = new ConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00052                 }
00053             }
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 // Function: ~ColumnDeleteCommand()
00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 ColumnDeleteCommand::~ColumnDeleteCommand()
00062 {
00063     if (del_)
00064     {
00065         delete column_;
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 // Function: undo()
00071 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 void ColumnDeleteCommand::undo()
00073 {
00074     // Add the item back to the layout.
00075     layout_->addColumn(column_);
00076     del_ = false;
00077 
00078     // Execute child commands.
00079     QUndoCommand::undo();
00080 }
00081 
00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 // Function: redo()
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void ColumnDeleteCommand::redo()
00086 {
00087     // Execute child commands.
00088     QUndoCommand::redo();
00089 
00090     // Remove the item from the layout.
00091     layout_->removeColumn(column_);
00092     del_ = true;
00093 }

00098 ComponentDeleteCommand::ComponentDeleteCommand(DiagramComponent* component, QUndoCommand* parent) :
00099     QUndoCommand(parent), component_(component), parent_(static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(component->parentItem())),
00100     scene_(component->scene()), del_(true)
00101 {
00102     // Create child commands for removing interconnections.
00103     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, component_->childItems())
00104     {
00105         if (item->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00106         {
00107             continue;
00108         }
00109 
00110         DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00111 
00112         foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, diagramPort->getInterconnections())
00113         {
00114             QUndoCommand* cmd = new ConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 }

00130 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 // Function: undo()
00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void ComponentDeleteCommand::undo()
00134 {
00135     // Add the item back to the scene.
00136     parent_->addItem(component_);
00137     del_ = false;
00138 
00139         emit componentInstantiated(component_);
00140 
00141     // Execute child commands.
00142     QUndoCommand::undo();
00143 }

00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 // Function: redo()
00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 void ComponentDeleteCommand::redo()
00149 {
00150     // Execute child commands.
00151     QUndoCommand::redo();
00152 
00153     // Remove the item from the scene.
00154     parent_->removeItem(component_);
00155     scene_->removeItem(component_);
00156     del_ = true;
00157 
00158         emit componentInstanceRemoved(component_);
00159 }

00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Function: ConnectionDeleteCommand()
00163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 ConnectionDeleteCommand::ConnectionDeleteCommand(DiagramInterconnection* conn,
00165                                                  QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent), conn_(conn),
00166                                                  mode1_(General::MASTER), mode2_(General::MASTER),
00167                                                  portMaps_(), scene_(conn->scene()), del_(true)
00168 {
00169     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf1 = conn_->endPoint1()->getBusInterface();
00170     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf2 = conn_->endPoint2()->getBusInterface();
00171 
00172     if (busIf1 != 0 && busIf1->getBusType().isValid())
00173     {
00174         mode1_ = busIf1->getInterfaceMode();
00175 
00176         if (conn_->endPoint1()->isHierarchical())
00177         {
00178             portMaps_ = busIf1->getPortMaps();
00179         }
00180     }
00181 
00182     if (busIf2 != 0 && busIf2->getBusType().isValid())
00183     {
00184         mode2_ = busIf2->getInterfaceMode();
00185 
00186         if (conn_->endPoint2()->isHierarchical())
00187         {
00188             portMaps_ = busIf2->getPortMaps();
00189         }
00190     }
00191 }

00204 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 // Function: undo()
00206 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 void ConnectionDeleteCommand::undo()
00208 {
00209     // Add the item back to the scene.
00210     scene_->addItem(conn_);
00211     
00212     // Connect the ends and set the interface modes.
00213     conn_->connectEnds();
00214 
00215     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf1 = conn_->endPoint1()->getBusInterface();
00216     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf2 = conn_->endPoint2()->getBusInterface();
00217 
00218     if (busIf1 != 0 && busIf1->getBusType().isValid())
00219     {
00220         busIf1->setInterfaceMode(mode1_);
00221 
00222         if (conn_->endPoint1()->isHierarchical())
00223         {
00224             busIf1->setPortMaps(portMaps_);
00225         }
00226 
00227         conn_->endPoint1()->updateInterface();
00228     }
00229 
00230     if (busIf2 != 0 && busIf2->getBusType().isValid())
00231     {
00232         busIf2->setInterfaceMode(mode2_);
00233 
00234         if (conn_->endPoint2()->isHierarchical())
00235         {
00236             busIf2->setPortMaps(portMaps_);
00237         }
00238 
00239         conn_->endPoint2()->updateInterface();
00240     }
00241 
00242     del_ = false;
00243 }
00244 
00245 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00246 // Function: redo()
00247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 void ConnectionDeleteCommand::redo()
00249 {
00250     // Disconnect the ends.
00251     conn_->disconnectEnds();
00252 
00253     // Remove the item from the scene.
00254     scene_->removeItem(conn_);
00255 
00256     del_ = true;
00257 }

00262 PortDeleteCommand::PortDeleteCommand(DiagramPort* port, QUndoCommand* parent) :
00263     QUndoCommand(parent), port_(port), parent_(static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(port->parentItem())),
00264     scene_(port->scene()), del_(true)
00265 {
00266     // Create child commands for removing interconnections.
00267     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, port_->getInterconnections())
00268     {
00269         QUndoCommand* cmd = new ConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00270     }
00271 }

00284 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00285 // Function: undo()
00286 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 void PortDeleteCommand::undo()
00288 {
00289     // Add the port back to the scene.
00290     scene_->addItem(port_);
00291 
00292     // Add the port to the parent component.
00293     parent_->addPort(port_);
00294     del_ = false;
00295 
00296     // Execute child commands.
00297     QUndoCommand::undo();
00298 }
00299 
00300 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 // Function: redo()
00302 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00303 void PortDeleteCommand::redo()
00304 {
00305     // Execute child commands.
00306     QUndoCommand::redo();
00307 
00308     // Remove the port from the parent component.
00309     parent_->removePort(port_);
00310 
00311     // Remove the port from the scene.
00312     scene_->removeItem(port_);
00313     del_ = true;
00314 }

00316 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00317 // Function: InterfaceDeleteCommand()
00318 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00319 InterfaceDeleteCommand::InterfaceDeleteCommand(DiagramInterface* interface, QUndoCommand* parent) :
00320     QUndoCommand(parent), interface_(interface), busIf_(interface_->getBusInterface()),
00321     parent_(static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(interface->parentItem())),
00322     scene_(interface->scene()), del_(true)
00323 {
00324     // Create copies of the related ports.
00325     QList<Port*> ports = interface_->getPorts();
00326 
00327     foreach (Port* port, ports)
00328     {
00329         ports_.append(QSharedPointer<Port>(new Port(*port)));
00330     }
00331 
00332     // Create child commands for removing interconnections.
00333     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, interface_->getInterconnections())
00334     {
00335         QUndoCommand* cmd = new ConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00336     }
00337 }

00341 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00345     {
00346         delete interface_;
00347     }

00350 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00351 // Function: undo()
00352 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 void InterfaceDeleteCommand::undo()
00354 {
00355     // Add the interface back to the scene.
00356     parent_->addItem(interface_);
00357     del_ = false;
00358 
00359     // Redefine the interface.
00360     if (busIf_ != 0)
00361     {
00362         interface_->define(busIf_, ports_);
00363     }
00364 
00365     // Execute child commands.
00366     QUndoCommand::undo();
00367 }
00368 
00369 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370 // Function: redo()
00371 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00372 void InterfaceDeleteCommand::redo()
00373 {
00374     // Execute child commands.
00375     QUndoCommand::redo();
00376 
00377     // Undefine the interface.
00378     if (busIf_ != 0)
00379     {
00380         interface_->undefine();
00381     }
00382 
00383     // Remove the interface from the scene.
00384     parent_->removeItem(interface_);
00385     scene_->removeItem(interface_);
00386     del_ = true;
00387 }
